dependencies.description:
Fastpath is a fast and lightweight tool for finding the shortest path in
a weighted graph. As input it only needs the starting node, the ending
node, and the weights of each node to node edge.
dependencies.name: py-fastpath

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
pharokka is a rapid standardised annotation pipeline for bacteriophage
genomes
dependent_to.name: pharokka

description:
PHANOTATE is a tool to annotate phage genomes. It uses the assumption
that non-coding bases in a phage genome is disadvantageous, and then
populates a weighted graph to find the optimal path through the six
frames of the DNA where open reading frames are beneficial paths, while
gaps and overlaps are penalized paths.
name: py-phanotate

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
